name: Crazy CarToon
storyline:
You start with a very simple vehicle and you will have to win races and collect rings to be able to get new pieces with which to improve your car. 
 
Each race that finishes with podium will unlock you the next races of that championship. 
 
When you win a championship you are unlocked the next of that category or a new category. 
There are four different categories with between 3 and 5 championships each. 
 
To win the race you will have to be the fastest, the most skilled or the most destructive. You choose.
summary:
Crazy CarToon is a car racing video game with cartoon style . You can play speed race and time trial , improve your car and use weapons against your rivals. 
Winning being the fastest, the most skilled or the most destructive. 
 
Collect rings in the races to be able to buy upgrades for your car. In the garage you can find to much car parts. 
 
You can choose between different bodyworks , wheels , fenders , nitros , engines , ECUs , weapons . Every car part improve differents attributes like health , nitro , power , max speed , steer help ... 
 
GAME MODES: 
-Campaign 
-Training 
 
RACE MODES: 
-SpeedRace 
-TimeTrial 
-TakeTheFlag 
-DeathRace 
-DeadArena
